title: Sesame prawn and crab toasts
ingredients: ['Prawn and crab topping', '85 g (3 oz) peeled raw prawns, very finely chopped', '85 g (3 oz) fresh white crab meat, flaked', '2 spring onions, thinly sliced', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '½ small red pepper, seeded and diced', '½ tsp finely grated lemon zest', 'pinch of cayenne pepper', '1 tbsp double cream', 'Toasts', '2 tbsp double cream', '1 large egg', '2 large slices of oatmeal or soft grain bread', '2 tsp sesame seeds', 'salt and pepper', 'shredded spring onions to garnish']
